column4: I got E: mailformed line 57 in source list /etc/apt/sources.list what I should do?
pastebinit /etc/apt/sources.list  #And sent resulting url
or just try commenting out that line.
If you look at it, and compare to other lines, you will probably see.  #
You will see other lines with  #   as first character.
You should show us
Can you read?
lsb_release -r
What does it say?
Have you done a distribution upgrade?
Then how did those lines get in there?
You must have a network problem
sudo apt-get update
You must edit as in admin mode  sudo  gsudo
gksudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list
Solve your network problem and upload the file to paste.ubuntu.com
Did you look at the date of the file before you edited it?  (It might give you a clue as to what happened to it.)
You probably should have just changed the words lucid to precise
i did what you said and it's working fine
If you change it again, do apt-get update  (And from now on, if you add repositories, watch what you are doing, use the application that does it for you).
thank you
see https://wiki.ubuntu.com/RecommendedSources
I did it ,thank you
